question:
Which of the following is correct regarding Union Public Service Commission?
1. It is the ‘watch-dog of merit system’ in India.
2. Conducts recruitment to the all-India services and Central services–group A and group B.
3. Involved in classification of services, pay and service conditions, cadre management & training.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Union Public Service Commission is the ‘watch-dog of merit system’ in India. It conducts recruitment to the all-India services and Central services–group A and group B. It is not involved in classification of services, pay and service conditions, cadre management & training. These matters are handled by the Department of Personnel and Training.
